title: Horizon - 76 Eps to Oct 2014 - Documentary - Xvid
description:
Horizon - TVrip - Documentary - Xvid 



=================================================

Horizon is a current and long-running BBC popular science and philosophy documentary programme.


Horizon mission statement, The aim of Horizon is to provide a platform from which some of the world's greatest scientists and philosophers can communicate their curiosity, observations and reflections, and infuse into our common knowledge their changing views of the universe.



.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Horizon_(BBC_TV_series)" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Horizon_episodes</a>



There is a issue people naming these eps.

Sometimes it's named by year 2012
Sometimes it crosses years 2012-2013
Sometimes there is a gap of (6 months) in a series

I have used Wikipedia listings
